We had to storm Mount Bezdog anyway."},{"lineNumber":263077,"originalJapaneseLine":"このままいくぞー","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s go as we City) to reduce damages to people."},{"lineNumber":263085,"originalJapaneseLine":"　※なんか入れてもよい","translatedEnglishLine":"* You may add something here if you want."},{"lineNumber":263086,"originalJapaneseLine":"動ける者だけ集めて先行する事にした。","translatedEnglishLine":"We decided to gather only those who can move and proceed members)"},{"lineNumber":263089,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前ら動けるようになったら追いかけてこいといい","translatedEnglishLine":"They said to come after us once you can move again."},{"lineNumber":263090,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は出発する","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others depart."},{"lineNumber":263091,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の端まで移動する・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Move to the edge of the world...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして落ちてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then we fall down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空飛ぶランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flying Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ターゲットの都市に降下
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Descend upon the target city

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Begin attack

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２時間経過・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Two hours have passed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念ながら見つけられなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unfortunately, we couldn’t find it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空飛ぶランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flying Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ターゲットの都市に降下
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Descend upon the target city

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Begin attack

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空飛ぶランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flying Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ターゲットの都市に降下
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Descend upon the target city

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Begin attack

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空飛ぶランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flying Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物界を移動中・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Traveling through the demon realm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、ベズドグ山という所を攻めるぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's attack the place called Mount Bezdog.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかりました、アニスに報告、進路ＸＸＸＸ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Understood, report to Anis, course XXXX.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空飛ぶランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flying Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山が見えてきましたと報告・・ランスは見にいく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Report that Mount Bezdog has come into view... Rance goes to see it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ・・あれは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What... is that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山の様子におどろく、火山・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surprised by the state of Mount Bezdog, a volcano...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵の軍団は近くにいないなて・・当たり前か、こんな所いたら魔物兵も死ぬな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s no demon soldier army nearby... well naturally, if they were here they'd die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほんとうにケイブリスが居る可能性があるのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is there really a possibility that Cavebris is here?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつが昔よく使っていた隠れ家、今も居るかはわからんが可能性は高い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s the hideout he often used in the past; not sure if he’s still here, but the possibility is high.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、どう侵入すれば・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But how do we infiltrate...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火山が噴火しているので近寄れないぞ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can’t get close because the volcano is erupting...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２６０／２／ベズドグ山　参照
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: See 260/2/Mount Bezdog for reference.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山にどうやって入るか悩んでいたランス達の報告
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Report from Rance and the others struggling on how to enter Mount Bezdog.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニスから魔法通信・・えっと、なになに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magical communication from Anis... um, what is it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 卵を落とした、暑くて汗かいて、すべった・・ごめんね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I dropped the egg, it was hot and I was sweating and slipped... sorry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 卵って・・トッポスを誘導する為に使っている卵か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Egg... the egg used to lure Toppos...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それしかないですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s no other explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いきなり城がゆれる、急激がＧがかかりひっぱられる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly the castle shakes, strong G-forces pull on it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トッポスが卵を追いかけてベズドグ山に突っ込んだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Toppos chased the egg and charged into Mount Bezdog.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひっぱられランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Rance Castle is being dragged.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 危険です、どうやに卵はベズドグ山の火口に落ちた模様。トッポスはそれを取る為に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dangerous! It seems the egg fell into the crater of Mount Bezdog. Toppos will go in to get it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山内に突入していくと思われます、ランス城もそれにひっぱられて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s expected Toppos will break into Mount Bezdog, and the Rance Castle is being dragged along...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山に向けて落下激突してしまいす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We crash down and collide toward Mount Bezdog.
Wha—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いますぐ、繋がっている強化縄を全て切り離しなさい・・と誰かが命令を入れるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Immediately cut all the connected reinforced ropes... someone orders, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 待て、このままでいいとランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait, it’s fine like this, says Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにを・・このままでは、落下して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you doing... at this rate, we’ll fall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 面白い、どうせあのベズドグ山に突入しないといけなかったのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interesting. We had to storm Mount Bezdog anyway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままいくぞー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s go as we are!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひぇーーーー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eeeeek!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてランス城はベズドグ山に落下した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then the Rance Castle crashed into Mount Bezdog.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 揺れ、暗転・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shaking, fade to black...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山内
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside Mount Bezdog.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が目を覚ます、あたりは大混乱・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others wake up, everything is in chaos...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怪我人は多いが、主要なメンバーは全員無事な事が確認された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many are injured, but it’s confirmed the main members are all safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※闘神ゼータが本体（闘神都市）をうまく使って人々の被害を減らしたとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: * It is said that the Fighting God Zeta skillfully used his main base (Fighting God City) to reduce damages to people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※なんか入れてもよい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: * You may add something here if you want.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動ける者だけ集めて先行する事にした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We decided to gather only those who can move and proceed ahead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （動ける者＝　サンセット号のメンバー＋留守番組と同じ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Those who can move = Sunset ship members + same as those staying behind)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （動けない者＝サンライズ号のメンバーと同じ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Those who cannot move = same as Sunrise ship members)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前ら動けるようになったら追いかけてこいといい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They said to come after us once you can move again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は出発する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others depart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

chaos..."},{"lineNumber":263083,"originalJapaneseLine":"怪我人は多いが、主要なメンバーは全員無事な事が確認された","translatedEnglishLine":"Many are injured, but it’s confirmed the main members are all safe."},{"lineNumber":263084,"originalJapaneseLine":"　※闘神ゼータが本体（闘神都市）をうまく使って人々の被害を減らしたとか","translatedEnglishLine":"* It is said that the Fighting God Zeta skillfully used his main base (Fighting God City) to reduce damages to people."},{"lineNumber":263085,"originalJapaneseLine":"　※なんか入れてもよい","translatedEnglishLine":"* You may add something here if you want."},{"lineNumber":263086,"originalJapaneseLine":"動ける者だけ集めて先行する事にした。","translatedEnglishLine":"We decided to gather only those who can move and proceed ahead."},{"lineNumber":263087,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（動ける者＝　サンセット号のメンバー＋留守番組と同じ）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Those who can move = Sunset ship members + same as those staying behind)"},{"lineNumber":263088,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（動けない者＝サンライズ号のメンバーと同じ）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Those who cannot move = same as Sunrise ship members)"},{"lineNumber":263089,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前ら動けるようになったら追いかけてこいといい","translatedEnglishLine":"They said to come after us once you can move again."},{"lineNumber":263090,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は出発する","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others depart."},{"lineNumber":263091,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の端まで移動する・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Move to the edge of the world...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして落ちてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then we fall down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空飛ぶランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flying Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ターゲットの都市に降下
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Descend upon the target city

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Begin attack

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２時間経過・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Two hours have passed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念ながら見つけられなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unfortunately, we couldn’t find it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空飛ぶランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flying Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ターゲットの都市に降下
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Descend upon the target city

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Begin attack

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空飛ぶランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flying Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ターゲットの都市に降下
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Descend upon the target city

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Begin attack

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空飛ぶランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flying Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物界を移動中・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Traveling through the demon realm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、ベズドグ山という所を攻めるぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's attack the place called Mount Bezdog.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかりました、アニスに報告、進路ＸＸＸＸ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Understood, report to Anis, course XXXX.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空飛ぶランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flying Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山が見えてきましたと報告・・ランスは見にいく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Report that Mount Bezdog has come into view... Rance goes to see it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ・・あれは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What... is that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山の様子におどろく、火山・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surprised by the state of Mount Bezdog, a volcano...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵の軍団は近くにいないなて・・当たり前か、こんな所いたら魔物兵も死ぬな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s no demon soldier army nearby... well naturally, if they were here they'd die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほんとうにケイブリスが居る可能性があるのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is there really a possibility that Cavebris is here?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつが昔よく使っていた隠れ家、今も居るかはわからんが可能性は高い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s the hideout he often used in the past; not sure if he’s still here, but the possibility is high.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、どう侵入すれば・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But how do we infiltrate...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火山が噴火しているので近寄れないぞ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can’t get close because the volcano is erupting...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２６０／２／ベズドグ山　参照
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: See 260/2/Mount Bezdog for reference.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山にどうやって入るか悩んでいたランス達の報告
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Report from Rance and the others struggling on how to enter Mount Bezdog.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニスから魔法通信・・えっと、なになに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magical communication from Anis... um, what is it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 卵を落とした、暑くて汗かいて、すべった・・ごめんね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I dropped the egg, it was hot and I was sweating and slipped... sorry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 卵って・・トッポスを誘導する為に使っている卵か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Egg... the egg used to lure Toppos...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それしかないですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s no other explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いきなり城がゆれる、急激がＧがかかりひっぱられる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly the castle shakes, strong G-forces pull on it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トッポスが卵を追いかけてベズドグ山に突っ込んだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Toppos chased the egg and charged into Mount Bezdog.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひっぱられランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Rance Castle is being dragged.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 危険です、どうやに卵はベズドグ山の火口に落ちた模様。トッポスはそれを取る為に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dangerous! It seems the egg fell into the crater of Mount Bezdog. Toppos will go in to get it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山内に突入していくと思われます、ランス城もそれにひっぱられて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s expected Toppos will break into Mount Bezdog, and the Rance Castle is being dragged along...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山に向けて落下激突してしまいす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We crash down and collide toward Mount Bezdog.
Wha—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いますぐ、繋がっている強化縄を全て切り離しなさい・・と誰かが命令を入れるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Immediately cut all the connected reinforced ropes... someone orders, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 待て、このままでいいとランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait, it’s fine like this, says Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにを・・このままでは、落下して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you doing... at this rate, we’ll fall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 面白い、どうせあのベズドグ山に突入しないといけなかったのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interesting. We had to storm Mount Bezdog anyway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままいくぞー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s go as we are!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひぇーーーー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eeeeek!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてランス城はベズドグ山に落下した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then the Rance Castle crashed into Mount Bezdog.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 揺れ、暗転・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shaking, fade to black...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山内
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside Mount Bezdog.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が目を覚ます、あたりは大混乱・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others wake up, everything is in chaos...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怪我人は多いが、主要なメンバーは全員無事な事が確認された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many are injured, but it’s confirmed the main members are all safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※闘神ゼータが本体（闘神都市）をうまく使って人々の被害を減らしたとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: * It is said that the Fighting God Zeta skillfully used his main base (Fighting God City) to reduce damages to people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※なんか入れてもよい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: * You may add something here if you want.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動ける者だけ集めて先行する事にした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We decided to gather only those who can move and proceed ahead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （動ける者＝　サンセット号のメンバー＋留守番組と同じ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Those who can move = Sunset ship members + same as those staying behind)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （動けない者＝サンライズ号のメンバーと同じ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Those who cannot move = same as Sunrise ship members)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前ら動けるようになったら追いかけてこいといい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They said to come after us once you can move again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は出発する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others depart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile...
